structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Funds not to be diverted to other use -- Records -- Annual financial report.

text.section: Funds appropriated by KRS 177.375 to 177.380 and any other act for transportation center programs shall not be diverted for any other use.
The University of Kentucky and the transportation center shall maintain such records as necessary to account for all receipts and expenditures credited or charged against the transportation center.
An annual financial report shall be submitted to the executive director of the Legislative Research Commission and to the Governor by the university on behalf of the transportation center.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 394, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1984.

metadata.former-history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 21. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 1
metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Gasoline tax revenues are in addition to other road fund appropriations.
